hero.heading: Wind Load
hero.copy: Your garage door is usually the largest opening in your home and the most vulnerable to damage during severe weather.

inspiration.heading: Make sure you’re ready for Mother Nature.
copy: Wind load doors are built to handle hurricane-level winds. If you live in a coastal area, your local building code requires that you have one.

inspiration.heading: Not all wind load doors are created equal.
copy: The best way to find your area’s wind load requirements is to reach out to a local building code official. Even if you’re a hundred miles inland, you might be surprised to see how strict your wind load code is.

next.heading: Now, take a minute to create your checklist.
next.copy: While your ideas are still fresh, why not jot down a checklist to bring into a store?
